sources.title: 1940 Angelika ( Olga Tschechowa, Albrecht Schönhals, Friedrich Kayssler)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1940. Angelika.  U.a mit Albrecht Schönhals und Olga Tschechowa

metadata.Plot: Once a celebrated opera singer, who sacrificed her career for her husband. Now she strives to become a successful painter. One day, the husband suffers a fatal accident while out horse riding. A short time later, Angelika shoots the art dealer Immerzeel. The court is unable to figure out the facts around the shooting, but assume that Immerzeel was her lover and sentence her to four years imprisonment for manslaughter.
metadata.Actors: Olga Tschechowa, Albrecht Schoenhals, Friedrich Kayßler
